title: Universal Design for Learning (UDL) Application Project for Inclusive Learning Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and general understanding of social issues
context.additional_context: Adult learners with diverse educational backgrounds and abilities collaborate on projects addressing social inclusion challenges.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more inclusive learning environment design strategies that consider diverse learner needs
Learners can plan real-world problem-solving projects by applying the three principles of Universal Design for Learning (UDL)
Learners can analyze and improve the interaction between accessibility and usability through project deliverables
Learners can implement communication strategies that respect learner diversity during large-scale team collaboration

resources: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Guidelines Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
